post:
We have our first offering of the year in 2013! Lets start this year with a savings BANG! We are offering 35% off the first month to kick things off! This offer will be active until the end of January!


Virtualization: OpenVZ & SolusVM

2560 Burstable RAM
50GB Disk Space

4 CPU Cores
